abstract: Fox News's airing of Republican debate draws impressive 23.9 million voters, making it most highly-viewed presidential primary debate in history and among most-viewed cable television events ever; previous cable record-holders were college football events on ESPN.
lead_paragraph: The debate broke previous records for primary debates, and is the ninth-most viewed cable program ever, according to Nielsen. The top eight were college football games broadcast on ESPN.

headline.print_headline: Republicans Set Record, Outdrawing Elite Sports
